value:
$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Attention! Dvergr troops have
appeared on the northern border!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain|They're in the north this time?! How
can we ever know where they'll show
up if they can appear anywhere?$k$pThat'll make strategizing tricky,
even for $Nu.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|They are formidable indeed. Every
other country they've invaded has
fallen, one by one.$k$pThat is the power granted to them
by their mastery of seiðjárn.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Pain2|They've already conquered so many
others? Alfonse, this all gives me
a bad feeling, down to my bones...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|We mustn't lose hope, Sharena.
As long as we don't give up,
we have a chance. Plus...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|Plus...what?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|We may be able to get some insight
when next we meet Princess Reginn.
Call it a feeling in my bones.$k$pI can tell we're on the same page,
$Nu. I'm glad.$k$p$EFace_Smile|Together, there is no obstacle
too great for us to overcome!$k$p$EFace_Normal2|And that is more than a feeling
in the bones—I know it in my heart
of hearts. Now, lead on!$k$p$Sbs150|
